name: error-slack
description: A Jovo plugin to automatically send error messages to a Slack webhook

name: raven
description: Jovo plugin that sends errors to a Sentry server using Raven

name: cellular-ssml
description: Jovo Plugin to supercharge the SpeechBuilder

name: error-email
description: Jovo plugin to send errors as an email

name: canfulfill-slack
description: Jovo plugin to automatically send data about incoming Alexa CanFulfillRequests to a Slack webhook

name: fallback-airtable
description: Jovo plugin to automatically store data from incoming Default Fallback Requests in an Airtable spreadsheet.
